fixes.name: Tenor CMF ToH
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR days = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[RISK_DATE] - 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE]
RETURN
IF(
    YEAR('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[RISK_DATE]) = 1980 && 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[BUCKET_MODE_IND] = "PARALLEL",
    "Parallel",
    IF(
        days <= 96, "0-3M",
        IF(
            days <= 189, "3-6M",
            IF(
                days <= 371, "6M-1Y",
                IF(
                    days <= 556, "1-1.5Y",
                    IF(
                        days <= 1102, "1.5-3Y",
                        IF(
                            days <= 1832, "3-5Y",
                            IF(days > 1832, ">5Y", "Error")
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level Tableau IF/ELSE bucket logic into a DAX calculated column. Inlined the calculated field [Risk Date # of Days] as the difference ('RISK_DATE' - 'EFFECTIVE_DATE') and preserved the top-level override returning "Parallel" when YEAR(RISK_DATE)=1980 and BUCKET_MODE_IND="PARALLEL". All column references were converted to the 'Table'[Column] format.
